title: Rp Cards
body: I bought an RP card which is worth 25$, now waht i didnt realize is that EUW isnt meant for dollar cards and im stuck. Help?!

replies.body:
Hmm.. hit us up in a [_support ticket_](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing specialists will see if there's something we can do. I can't make any promises, but that's the best course of action right now.

I hope this helped!
